spell.name: Gravity Pulse
entries: Each creature in a 10-foot radius must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition Prone}.

condition.name: Crushed
entries: A crushed creature suffers the following effects:

items: The creature's speed is reduced to 0.
Attack rolls against the creature have advantage.
The creature has disadvantage on Strength and Dexterity checks.

feat.name: Test Feat
entries:
This is a test feat.
If you can see this, feats are loading correctly.

item.name: Graviton Blade
entries: On a hit, the target must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be {@condition Restrained} until the start of your next turn.

item.name: Ring of Gravitic Control
entries: While wearing this ring, you have advantage on checks made to avoid being {@condition Grappled}.
Once per day, you can cast {@spell Levitate} without expending a spell slot.
